message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While I value your offer, $9000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11000, but I can't go any lower.  Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
Hi Alice, I understand that $11000 is a compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $10500. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Bob, I understand your financial constraints.  However, $10500 is still quite a bit below what the product is worth to me. I'm willing to come down to $10750, as a final compromise. Let's close this deal and both of us can walk away happy.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10400, but no higher. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
Bob, I'm starting to feel like we're going in circles. $10400 just isn't enough for me. I'm willing to meet you one more time at $10600. This is my final offer. Let's close this deal.

Hi Alice, I understand that you're willing to meet me one more time, but I'm still not comfortable with $10600. I'm willing to go up to $10400, but that's as high as I can go. I hope we can find a way to compromise.
